content: How to integrate/embedded the model that made by forge, such as new profiles ,into the website like FHIR. I have own website like FHIR and can build all xml file to webpage by hard coding. But cannot use the model file of forge generate.
@Fan Lin did you look at the FHIR IG Publisher and related discussions here?
it seems you want to use the IG publisher
@Jose Costa Teixeira I try , thanks

Hi @Fan Lin, Simplifier also supports embedded rendering of profiles:
http://docs.simplifier.net/simplifier/simplifierEmbeddedRendering.html
This feature is available for all Enterprise accounts. Please contact me if you need more information.
